results.title: Your Perfect Match
results.subtitle: Based on your unique preferences, we've selected these fragrances that perfectly match your personality.
results.loadingMessage: We're crafting your perfect fragrance recommendation...

personalities.elegant: You seek elegance and sophistication. Classic and timeless fragrances reflect your style.
personalities.relaxed: You are drawn to calming and soothing scents. Relaxing notes are perfect for you.
personalities.vibrant: You enjoy lively and energetic fragrances. Eye-catching and cheerful perfumes appeal to you.
personalities.romantic: You have a tendency toward romantic and emotional scents. Floral and sweet notes are ideal for you.
personalities.floral: Floral scents reflect your style. Elegant and feminine notes appeal to you.
personalities.fresh: You seek refreshing and invigorating scents. Citrus and marine notes are perfect for you.
personalities.sophisticated: You are drawn to sophisticated and luxurious scents. Rich and complex notes reflect your style.
personalities.warm: You enjoy warm and comforting scents. Spicy and woody notes appeal to you.
personalities.adventurous: You seek adventurous and dynamic scents. Bold and unexpected notes reflect your style.
personalities.natural: You are drawn to natural and earthy scents. Green and woody notes appeal to you.
personalities.modern: You enjoy modern and innovative scents. Clean and minimalist notes are ideal for you.

hero.title: Discover Your Signature Scent
hero.subtitle: Explore our curated collection of luxury perfumes, each crafted to evoke emotion and leave a lasting impression.

compare.title: Compare Perfumes
compare.maxItems: You can only compare up to {max} perfumes at a time

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Alda Perfume, we believe that fragrance is a form of self-expression. Our mission is to create exceptional scents that capture emotions, memories, and dreams. We are dedicated to producing perfumes that not only smell amazing but also tell a story and evoke feelings.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We source the finest ingredients from around the world to create perfumes of exceptional quality.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to sustainable practices in all aspects of our business, from sourcing to packaging.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of perfumery to create unique and memorable fragrances.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We believe that everyone should be able to find a scent that resonates with them, regardless of gender, age, or background.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate individuals behind our exceptional fragrances

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

about.title: About Alda
about.description: Luxury perfumes crafted with the finest ingredients to create unforgettable scent experiences.
